summary:
Join together with your friends and family and; Adventure Skyrim together, Complete mighty feats, Throw cheese at each other, or fight the enemies that dare to defy you!
This mod is a SLOW-progressing modification, and will take a long time to complete if necessary.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#3d85c6] [/color][size=6][color=#3d85c6]!i This mod is still in Progress i![/color]
[/size][/size][size=4][color=#073763] Sorry guys. I will be working on this when I can, but it will take some time to even
get the alpha out. Thanks for visiting the page! Remember to track this mod for any updates.[/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=6][size=5]         Icon Art is appreciated.[/size]
[size=2]   [size=3]   You guys would be awesome if you could make a new icon for this newbie mod. Send me a link to the deviant art
       location and I'll use it here. (Credit will be given.)[/size][/size][/size][/color]

*SkyrimMP
[size=3][size=2]     This Modification to Skyrim allows players to band together and fight the strongest and dangerous
monsters... or just run around and throw cheese at each other. This mod will have a certain amount of expectations-
in which I will have listed down below. Help and Ideas are appreciated, if you have any,
message me personally (or talk by forum) and we'll discuss those matters.

 [size=5][color=#ff00ff] Expectations and Features:[/color]
[/size][/size][/size][/size][list][*][size=2]Compatible Mods/Modding[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Client/LAN Server (2-4 players)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Online/Larger Server (2-20(or 40)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Group/Party System. (EXP System, Quest Share, Skill Tree, Etc)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Player Follower(s) (Every player can have a follower)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Player Storage(s)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Host Save/load the Save/World (And have Player saves on it)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Individual and Multiplayer Impacts[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Possible Faction, and-or Guild Affiliations[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Multiplayer Features (Hosting Preferences, Chat log, Etc.)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]DLC Compatible[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Loot balancing and raising[/size][/*]
[/list][size=4]
  And so on...
[size=2]Message me if you have anymore expectations and features you would like to have on this mod![/size]

[/size][color=#f4cccc]You see, This mod requires a lot of Coders/Modders to come together
and make this possible. Just me doing it alone will take a long time. I want to ask the people
what they want and if they can help. So we can all get this out and ready as fast as we can.[/color]
Message me if you want to help.
author: Aleskiez
